original_text: Joseph collected all the money that was to be found in Egypt and Canaan in payment for the grain they were buying, and he brought it to Pharaoh’s palace.
korean_text: 요셉이 곡식을 팔아 애굽 땅과 가나안 땅에 있는 돈을 모두 거두어들이고 그 돈을 바로의 궁으로 가져가니

sentences.original_text: that was to be found in Egypt and Canaan
in payment for the grain they were buying
and he brought it to Pharaoh's palace
